spouseRoom_Alissa: I've been working on a new song darling. I hope to have you hear it first ofcourse!$h#$b#Hmm.. I'm still a little shy about singing in front of others though. But I'll try!$h#$e#This new microphone picks up my voice so good!$h
patio_Alissa: I'm just clearing my head here outside darling.$h#$b#It's so nice being here in the patio.
Rainy_Day_0: Awwee baby, I want to sleep innnn $s#$b#Do we really have to get ready for the dayyy?$s
Rainy_Day_1: Hey baby, can you stop what you’re doing and give your little wife a hug?$l#$b#She’s feeling a little cold right now and maybe you could help?*wink*Sl
Rainy_Day_2: Mother nature’s making her own way to take care of our crops today$h#$b#Well yay for us, more time for ‘us’ time baby hihi$l#$b#So what would you like to do today??
Rainy_Day_3: Hey @,  please take care of yourself when you go out alright?#$b#Remember to change your clothes if you get too wet okay?$h#$e#Or maybe I could change them for you.. hihi$l
Rainy_Day_4: Have you tried singing in the rain baby?$h#$b#Why don’t you come and join me!$6
Rainy_Day_Alissa: Ahhh, Singing in the rain gives me such a happy feeling$h#$b#Ah-ah-ah-ah-ahh she sings a tune to herself$6#$e#~What a glorious feeling, I’m happy again~ *she sings to herself $6
Rainy_Night_0: Why don’t you take off your clothes for me here baby#$b#WHAT?$l#$b#Oh,I didn’t mean it like that$l#$b#I meant, take off your clothes so that I could wash them and give you dry ones$l#$b#Buttt, if you mean it like that.. I could go along with what you like*wink*$l
Rainy_Night_1: Hi baby! You’re back! How was your day?$h#$b#I had an eventful day today.#$b#But my night’s going to become even more eventful now that you’re here*wink*$l
Rainy_Night_2: I cooked dinner for you baby!$h#$b#I hope you like it!$l#$b#Auntie Olga taught me an old recipe. She says that she got it from her great grandmother and she’s passing it on to me.#$b#I hope I did a good job making my own twist in it$l
Rainy_Night_3: You must be tired baby, come. Change your clothes and climb on the bed with me$h#$b#I’m going to sing you a lullaby to help you sleep$6
Rainy_Night_4: The rain’s been pretty vocal today.#$b#Hmmm.. maybe if I sing it’ll calm the rain down$6#$b#Hahaha any excuse just to sing, I know. Sorry $l
Rainy_Night_5: ~Rain rain, go away~$6#$b# Oh weelcome home baby$h#$b#Were you good today? I’m thinking about making a hot bath for myself tonight.. Maybe you’d like to join me?$l
Rainy_Night_Alissa: When life gives you rainy days, go out and play to make the bad days go away *she sings to herself*$6#$b#Come here baby, give me a hug and a kiss please? *pouts her cute little lips*$l
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning baby! I feel so energized today! I was able to write 3 verses for my new song$h#$b#Ahh it’s such a joy to be so carefree and in love $l
Indoor_Day_1: Hey baby, I’m going to go outside and sing to our farm today.$6#$b#Flor told me that it’s a good practice to talk to your plants.#$b#I’m going to try to sing to them, maybe they’ll grow even faster and bloom brighter haha $h
Indoor_Day_2: When you go out baby can you check if our crops are doing okay?#$b#I’m planning on tidying up inside our house today. I hope you don’t mind$h
Indoor_Day_3: Baby did you sleep good last night?#$b#I had the strangest dream, I actually thought I was in the middle of an amphitheatre alone with a spotlight on me. $9#$b#Hmmm.. I wonder what that means $11
Indoor_Day_4: Have a great day ahead baby!#$b#Bring me some of Pika’s special today please!#$b#I’m having some cravings about it hihi$l
Indoor_Day_Alissa: ~Rise and shine~$6#$b#Good morning @!$h#$b#It’s such a great way to start the morning with the person you love$l
Indoor_Night_0: Hi baby, how was your day?#$b#That’s great!#$b#What about mine?#$b#Well, Miss Lenny asked if I would make a little composition for the town$l#$b#I’m still a little nervous. What if the others won’t like what I’ll sing?$7
Indoor_Night_1: Are you done for the day baby?#$b#Would you like me to cook dinner for you? I just harvested some fresh crops earlier!$h
Indoor_Night_2: Let’s lie down and talk about our day baby!$l#$b#Yay a little ‘us time’ for you and me baby$h
Indoor_Night_3: I don’t know why baby, but I really find the night time inspiring.#$b#It gives me a lot of lyric ideas and even tune ideas$6
Indoor_Night_4: You’re home baby! Can you please take off your clothes and join me under the sheets right now?$l#$b#It’s time for us to have some alone time darling*wink*$l
Indoor_Night_Alissa: ~Lullaby.. And good night.. Let the starlights be your guide~$6#$b#What my darling?$l#$b#Hihi nothing, I’m just practicing some lullabies for when we decide to have kids$h

Outdoor_2: I wanna write you a song love.$l#$b#I want to make one as beautiful and as sweet as you are$h
Outdoor_3: ~Have you ever seen such a beautiful sight! I could almost kiss the stars for shining so bright~$6#$b#I don’t know where that song came from, it just went inside my head haha. Must’ve been a childhood memory $h
Outdoor_4: Ohh darling do you see our crops?$h#$b#We have so much and they all look so good! I’m so happy$h

funReturn_Alissa: ~I’m hoooooomeee~$6#$b#Haha You missed me @?$l#$b#Well, come on over here and give me a kiss *pouts*$l
